attributes.action: Change his name to Dick Turpin
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I petition that the Prime Minister change his name to Dick Turpin as he is robbing the poor tax payer blind. Who says crime doesn't pay.

NO FOUL LANGUAGE HAS BEEN USED, THIS IS NOT MEANT TO BE HUMEROUS AND IT IS TO DO WITH THE GOVERNMENT POLICY OF ROBING THE ORDINARY PERSON WITH STEALTH TAXES

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
